meanings.meaning: 1. surface Antonym: 裏
2. face (i.e. the visible side of an object) この紙はどちらが表だか見分けがつかない。I cannot tell which is the right side of this paper.
3. front (of a building, etc.); obverse side (i.e. "head") of a coin 私はその問題がわかっていない。裏と表の区別もついていない。I don't understand the problem; I could make neither head nor tail of it.
4. outside; exterior 一体何が今晩表であんなひどい音をたてているのか見当もつきません。I don't know what kind of creature is making such a terrible noise outside tonight.
5. appearance
6. public 内面の欠点は必ず表に現れる。An inner defect never fails to express itself outwardly.
7. first half (of an inning); top (of an inning) Baseball, Antonym: 裏 うら
8. cover (for tatami mats, etc.)
9. foreground Computing
10. Omotesenke school of tea ceremony Abbreviation, See also 表千家

1. to appear; to come in sight; to become visible; to come out; to embody; to materialize; to materialise ２０人の警官が現場に現れた。Twenty police have arrived on the scene.
2. to be expressed (e.g. emotions); to become apparent (e.g. trends, effects) その薬の効きめが現れた。The medicine took effect.
現われる 【あらわれる】、表れる 【あらわれる】、表われる 【あらわれる】、顕れる 【あらわれる】、顕われる 【あらわれる】

meanings.meaning: 1. expression; representation; description 「潮時というものがある」という表現は実はシェイクスピアの「ジュリアス・シーザー」にある表現である。"There is a tide" is, in fact, from a passage in Shakespeare's Julius Caesar.
2. representation (of a group) Mathematics

meanings.type: Godan verb with 'su' ending, Transitive verb
meanings.meaning: 1. to represent; to signify; to stand for esp. 表す, 表わす＆のマークはａｎｄの文字を表す。The sign "&" stands for "and".

meanings.type: Godan verb with 'su' ending, Transitive verb
meanings.meaning: 2. to reveal; to show; to display esp. 現す, 現わすご自分の栄光を現された。He thus revealed his glory.

meanings.type: Godan verb with 'su' ending, Transitive verb
meanings.meaning: 3. to express See also 言い表す, esp. 表す, 表わすあなたのご親切に対し深く感謝の意を表します。I wish to express my deep appreciation for your kindness.

meanings.type: Godan verb with 'su' ending, Transitive verb
